user_query: I need to analyze the M1 money stock adjusted data from the Federal Reserve. Additionally, I would like to check the current price of Ethereum and get the balance of my wallet address 0xe9e7cea3dedca5984780bafc599bd69add087d56.

TaskList.description: Fetch the adjusted M1 money stock data from the Federal Reserve API.
Analyze the M1 money stock adjusted data obtained from step 1.
Check the current price of Ethereum using a cryptocurrency price API.
Fetch the balance of the wallet address 0xe9e7cea3dedca5984780bafc599bd69add087d56 using a blockchain exploration API.
